info.name: VisitFlanders - Remove erroneous map
info.description:
With this custom style you will remove the erroneous maps of Flanders on site  
 http://www.visitflanders.co.uk/go/getting_there/ 


- Firefox only
- First install Stylish Add-ons for Firefox at https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/2108/
